-He stopped vote count when early results showed him going to run-off

If attacked the U.S. would stand with #Israel

#Iran & its proxies would target U.S. ships & U.S. bases in #Iraq #Syria #SaudiArabia & #Bahrain etc. etc. 

U.S. would in turn respond with devastating force

Even by MiddleEast standards we face a very tense & dangerous moment

-Serious erosion of our counter-ISIS capabilities
-Emergence of an ISIS safe haven from which they will plot attacks against the U.S.

What kind of society do we live in when a mother is charged nearly $1 million by her employer-based insurance for the birth of her own child? The health care system is broken. We need Medicare for All. https://twitter.com/propublica/status/1191709349116284928 QT @propublica This is the nearly $1 million dollar medical bill ER nurse and new mother Lauren Bard received after her baby was born prematurely. 

Her employer, Dignity Health, tried to use a loophole to stick her with the bill. 

 https://www.propublica.org/article/how-one-employer-stuck-a-new-mom-with-a-bill-for-her-premature-baby?utm_content=buffere789c&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter&utm_campaign=buffer http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EInNViUWkAINcNH.jpg
